cu.explanation_en: Setting drb_ciphering to an invalid value 'maybe' will cause security configuration parsing error and connection failure.

du.explanation_en: Setting do_CSIRS to -1 will cause invalid CSI-RS configuration and beamforming failure.
du.explanation_zh: 將 do_CSIRS 設定為 -1 會導致無效的 CSI-RS 配置，並造成波束成型失敗。
